item.description:
The show starts at 9pm, but some of us will be meeting @ 7 pm to grab a bite to eat before the dancing starts. If you want to join us for dinner, please respond to the DINNER BEFORE BOOTY VORTEX meetup so that we can have a correct number of people to make resovations.

Here' s the link to the event.

http://hardrockcafe.c...

Everyone who wants to attend will need to go to the site and purchase their tickets. They will be selling any available tickets at the door but I wouldn't take a chance.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be wearing the "Rainbow hair comb".
item.name: Booty Vortex on Valentine's Day
